page.title: 13Burton Latimer - Transport
page.content: Burton Latimer is a town on the main A6 trunk road from London to Carlisle. A study of the traffic coming into the town showed the quantity of traffic & the type and it was also possible to see the most dangerous places.More cars used the roads through the town than any other vehicle, but a number of very heavy goods vehicles go through the very narrow High Street, causing much noise and vibration. Many local people think that there should be a byepass. On the next screen page is a diagram showing the results of a traffic survey conducted at 9.15 am. on consecutive days at 5 points around the town in May 1985.
